column1: The river Ginglith was a river of Beleriand and a tributary to Narog.
The Ginglith had its wells in the woods of Núath
column2: under the near the Ered Wethrin in northern West Beleriand.
column3: note 14 After passing by the lands of Tumhalad it met the Narog about 50 Númenóreans miles north of Nargothrond.
